2 Sadie Edmonston

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

Honors & Awards

Athletic Director's Honor Roll: F22

2022 | Austin Peay

Appeared in 85 sets as a defensive specialist, finishing with 194 digs (2.28 per set) and 15 service aces.

Started four-straight matches, Oct. 28-Nov. 5, and had eight starts during the season.

Finished with eight double-digit dig performances, including a stretch of three-straight matches with double-digit digs, Oct. 7-12.

Recorded 13 digs and was credited with her first collegiate kill against Central Arkansas (Oct. 22) –her most digs in a home match during the season.

Followed that home outing with 14 digs at Liberty (Oct. 28).

Her three-match streak included a season-best 16 digs at Lipscomb (Oct. 12) after beginning the streak with 12 digs at Stetson (Oct. 7) and 13 digs at FGCU (Oct. 8).

Notched back-to-back double-digit kill outings at Clemson Invitational, scoring 12 digs against the host Tigers (Sept. 26) and 10 digs against Presbyterian (Sept. 27).

2018-21 | Cumberland

Began her career as a setter before moving into libero role in final three seasons in Lebanon, Tennessee.

Amassed 2,075 digs and 159 service aces during her Cumberland career.

Finished fourth among NAIA defenders with 772 total digs in 2021 as a senior, averaging 5.40 digs per set (30th in NAIA).

Earned Second Team All-Mid-South Conference as a senior.

Prep Career

Was a setter and libero for head coach Robert Smith at St. Michael the Archangel High School.

Participated in the 2017 Louisiana All-State Senior Game.

Earned all-district honorable mention three times during her prep career.

Also was an outfielder for St. Michael the Archangel High School softball team and earned second team all-district honors as a senior.

Personal

Sadie Alexandra Edmonston is the daughter of Paulette and Sterling Edmonston.

Birthday is Sept. 10.

Has two siblings: Savannah and Dillon.
